title: Evaluating functions
text: Given the equation for a function, we should replace the input variable in the equation with the value provided and then calculate the result.

title: Replacement
text: Replace the variable x with -a, and we get $$f(-a)=\frac{6negneg}\left(a\right)-1}{5\operatorname{\left(-a\right)+2}$$.

title: Simplification
text: Simplify the expression $$\frac{6negneg}\left(a\right)-1}{5\operatorname{\left(-a\right)+2}$$. What do you get?
